US Federal Reserve (Fed), the US central bank
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Lian2 bang1 Chu3 bei4

sentences.english: It is a principle of first importance that federal courts are courts of limited jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 联邦法院是有限管辖权法院，这是首要原则。

sentences.english: The red wolf has federally endangered status throughout its 29-state historic range.
sentences.chinese: 红狼在联邦的29个州已经是濒临灭绝的物种。

sentences.english: what we call a Federal Depository Receipt.
sentences.chinese: 这样的收据我们称为联邦存储收据。

sentences.english: States as well as the federal governments may impose quarantines or may operate quarantine facilities.
sentences.chinese: 隔离规定和隔离操作都有联邦政府进行。

sentences.english: He arrived boos at a federal courthouse in Richmond, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 他在维吉尼亚理德曼的联邦法院遭到了阵阵嘘声。

sentences.english: Using the Bridge Federate is one of the approaches to interconnect HLA multiple federations .
sentences.chinese: 实现多联邦互联有多种方法，桥接成员是其中一种。

sentences.english: It gave the job of carrying the letters to a new company -- the Overland Mail Company.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府将邮递信件的任务交给了美国陆路邮递公司。

sentences.english: This is smaller than the share of the UK in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 这比起在全球经济中英联邦所占的份额来还要少一些。

sentences.english: Federal authorities are now saying a possible assassination plot against Barack Obama posed no credible threat.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府称可能对奥巴马的刺杀阴谋只是一场虚惊。

sentences.english: And some of our federal lawmakers and administrators are good and decent souls.
sentences.chinese: 我们联邦政府的一些管理者和立法者也都是称职的。

sentences.english: Doris Leuthard, president of the Confederation of the Federal Council of Switzerland, sent sincere condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士联邦主席洛伊特哈德向中国人民表示诚挚慰问。

sentences.english: The premarket approval was "federal safety review" that was specific to an individual device .
sentences.chinese: 在批准前是“联邦安全审查”这是具体的个人设备。

sentences.english: Fort Worth has countered with a lawsuit, which is pending in the U.S. Court of Appeals.
sentences.chinese: 因此沃思堡将面临联邦上诉法院的控诉。

sentences.english: "We don't have rights to slide over into the federal prison system, " Pustelnik said.
sentences.chinese: 我们无权直接进入联邦监狱系统。

sentences.english: Now her case is hurtling toward the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 目前，费舍女士案已经告到联邦最高法院。

sentences.english: The inestimable value of our Federal Union is felt and acknowledged by all.
sentences.chinese: 我们联邦联盟的不可估量的价值为众人所感受和认可。

pinyin: Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
